name: THEY TOOK MY DOG!
description:
Rescue your beloved dog from the claws of the evil creatures that took it away from you!

Use your stylish sword to slice and dice everything that stands between you and the rescue of the century!

They took my dog! is  a short ninja gaiden-like action game with gameplay inspired in NES and SNES games.

So this is my first published game as a solo dev. It is also only my third completed game, so any criticism is welcomed.

As you can see graphics are not my forte, nor sound design, but I hope you enjoy the gameplay and level design, which I worked hard to do.

Music done by ERIC SKIFF: http://ericskiff.com/music/
